data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: Jane Street’s India unit saw trading gains soar 494% before curbs
data.description: The financial results cast new light on the scale of Jane Street’s trading operations in India, where the company is currently facing investigations by the stock market regulator.

data.title: Dollar sinks as Trump’s new tariffs raise fears about U.S. debt and reserve currency status. ‘When it’s lost, economic collapse will follow’
data.description: "The dollar’s reserve-currency status allows us to live beyond our means."

data.author: Alexandra Karplus
data.title: They quit, traveled, and rethought their lives — meet the adults taking gap years
data.description: Extended time off can carry long-term costs — lower earnings, disrupted savings, slower compounding — but for some, the benefits outweigh the risks.
data.content:
Getty Images; Alyssa Powell/BI
